summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.2°C) and outside temperature (down 4.2°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 662 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1611 m), feels like temperature (up 7.2°C), outside temperature (up 5.8°C), and dew point temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 661.6m lower than yesterday, 625.0m lower than the past week, 1610.8m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1062.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1687.7m and 2670m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and it’s dim outside. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
